name: Mr. Rime
flavorText:
It’s highly skilled at tap-dancing. It waves its cane
of ice in time with its graceful movements.

previous.name: Sirfetch’d
previous.flavorText:
Only Farfetch’d that have survived many battles
can attain this evolution. When this Pokémon’s
leek withers, it will retire from combat.

next.name: Runerigus
next.flavorText:
A powerful curse was woven into an ancient
painting. After absorbing the spirit of a Yamask,
the painting began to move.

pokemon.name: Mime Jr.
pokemon.flavorText:
It habitually mimics foes. Once
mimicked, the foe cannot take its
eyes off this Pokémon.

pokemon.name: Mr. Mime
pokemon.flavorText:
If interrupted
while it is
miming, it will slap around the
offender with its
broad hands.

pokemon.name: Mr. Rime
pokemon.flavorText:
It’s highly skilled at tap-dancing. It waves its cane
of ice in time with its graceful movements.
